commands.name: /ping
commands.description: Responds with Pong and shows latency!

commands.name: /hello
commands.description: Sends a friendly greeting.

commands.name: /joke
commands.description: Get a random joke for some laughs.

commands.name: /poll
commands.description: Create a poll for voting. Usage: /poll <question> <option1> <option2> ...

commands.name: /mock
commands.description: Mock a given text in SpOnGEbOb style.

commands.name: /trivia
commands.description: Play a trivia game! Answer questions to test your knowledge.

commands.name: /bothelp
commands.description: Displays a detailed help message for using the bot and its commands.

commands.name: /server_stats
commands.description: View real-time statistics for the server.

commands.name: /balance
commands.description: Check your current balance in the economy system.

commands.name: /daily
commands.description: Claim your daily reward to earn coins.

commands.name: /work
commands.description: Earn coins by working. Usage: /work to see available jobs.

commands.name: /give
commands.description: Give coins to another user. Usage: /give <user> <amount>

commands.name: /leaderboard
commands.description: View the top 10 richest users in the economy.

commands.name: /rules
commands.description: Displays the server rules to keep order.

commands.name: /news
commands.description: Get the latest news based on country and category.

commands.name: /birthday set
commands.description: Set your birthday for special announcements. Usage: /birthday set <MM/DD>

commands.name: /birthday check
commands.description: Check your registered birthday.

commands.name: /birthday list
commands.description: View upcoming birthdays in the server.

commands.name: /birthday channel
commands.description: Set the birthday announcement channel (Admin only).

commands.name: /weather
commands.description: Get the weather for a city or your default city. Usage: /weather <city>

commands.name: /setdefault
commands.description: Set your default city for the weather command.

commands.name: /clear
commands.description: Clears a specified number of messages from the chat. Usage: /clear <number>

commands.name: /meme
commands.description: Fetch a random meme to enjoy!

commands.name: /stock
commands.description: Get the current price of a stock. Usage: /stock <ticker>

commands.name: /crypto
commands.description: Get the current price of a cryptocurrency. Usage: /crypto <symbol>

commands.name: /setup_server
commands.description: Sets up server roles, categories, and channels (Owner-only and one-time use).
